contentList.content: Etched with eldritch runes, this 1-inch-diameter ruby allows you to use a simple or martial weapon as a spellcasting focus for your spells.

One-Handed Attacks with <LSTag Tooltip="Versatile">Versatile Weapons</LSTag> scale with your <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> instead of your <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> if your Dexterity is higher.
A deep burgundy colour, this stone seems to trap all light. Looks like someone has etched some kind of runes into it.
A 1-inch-diameter ruby that has been etched with eldritch runes.
